channel.title: briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesMainNLbusinessAndMarkets, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Inside a Lab Making the Advanced Fuel to Power Growing U.S. Nuclear Energy Ambitions
item.description: Companies like X-energy are charging up to create next-gen nuclear reactors. Here’s how the fuel is made.

item.title: Inside ‘Elvis Evolution’: AI and immersive tech bring the King’s life to the stage in London
item.description: Stage fright is not a term you’d associate with Elvis Presley, but in 1968 he was all shook up—with nerves. Ahead of his make-or-break “comeback speci...

item.title: ASML’s stock price is dropping today after the semiconductor giant issued this critical warning about 2026
item.description: One of the most critical companies in the chipmaking industry is seeing its stock price drop precipitously today. Dutch semiconductor company ASML Hol...

item.title: With all eyes on Apple’s next earnings report, one research firm calls on Tim Cook to step aside
item.description: Apple’s stock is down about 16% year to date.

item.title: Santander’s Botin disagrees with Dimon as she sees ‘only upside’ for Europe
item.description: “Southern Europe today has higher growth than most of the United States,” said Banco Santander SA Executive Chair Ana Botin.

item.title: Trump says he’s found a way to fire Fed Reserve Chair Powell. Here’s how

item.title: This 1 Tactic Can Help You Win Over Skeptical Consumers
item.description: When buyers doubt, honesty sells. Transparency isn’t just good ethics—it’s a sharp sales strategy.

item.title: Darth Vader’s original lightsaber is going up for auction. You’ll need $3 million or so to win it
item.description: Too steep? How does Sauron's helmet sound?

item.title: Leaked message show Marc Andreessen blasting elite colleges over DEI: ‘My people are furious and not going to take it anymore’
item.description: Andreessen Horowitz founder criticized Stanford University and MIT in private messages to top Trump administration officials over their alleged revers...

item.title: She played for three WNBA teams. Now she oversees $724 million in Wendy’s sales for the largest franchisee operator in the U.S.
item.description: Former WNBA player Rasheeda Clark is president of Flynn Wendy's, part of the franchising giant Flynn Group.

item.title: These 3 Strategies Can Improve Team Collaboration
item.description: An office move gave workplace experts a chance to experiment with ways to improve connections between co-workers. It paid off.

item.title: Why Bulletproof Coffee Is Getting Cold
item.description: The company famous for mixing butter with coffee is releasing a new product. It’s not butter, if you can believe it.

item.title: How to Grow a Food Truck Into a Nationwide Brand
item.description: Seth Goldman, founder of Honest Tea, coaches Ron Holloway, co-founder of Woofbowl, on expansion and how to market a growing food brand.
